name: Catagenesis
description:
Catagenesis is a top-down shooter game.

It starts as easy, but difficulty increases everytime you level up.

Controls

Game supports touch and keyboard & mouse controls.

- WASD/Touch anywhere to move

- Click/Double Touch anywhere to shoot

- E/Onscreen button to use aid

- R/Automatic to reload ammo

- 1 or 2/Onscreen buttons to change between guns

Languages

English, Deutsch, French, Russian, Chinese and Turkish are available.

Languages other than English may not be %100 accurate. (feel free to report errors on comments)

Credits

Code, art and sounds are made by Tuireol.

Game is made with Scratch & Turbowarp, html packaged with forkphorus.
